contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=July 2011}} {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Youth Society | Type = studio | Longtype = 青春株式會社 | Artist = [[S.H.E]] | Cover = SHE-CD02.JPG | Caption = ''Youth Society'' cover | Released = {{Start date|2002|01|29|df=yes}} | Recorded = | Genre = [[Mandopop]] | Length = {{Duration|m=40|s=08}} | Language = [[Standard Chinese|Mandarin]] | Label = [[HIM International Music]] | Producer = Joeloe Kuo (郭文宗) | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Girl's Dorm]]''<br />女生宿舍<br />(2001) | This album = '''''Youth Society'''''<br />青春株式會社<br />(2002) | Next album = ''[[Genesis (S.H.E album)|Genesis]]''<br />美麗新世界<br />(2002) }} '''''Youth Society''''' ({{zh|t=青春株式會社}}) is the second studio album by [[Taiwanese people|Taiwanese]] [[Mandopop]] [[girl group]] [[S.H.E]]. It was released on 29 January 2002 by [[HIM International Music]], four months after their debut album, ''[[Girl's Dorm]]''.<ref>{{zh icon}} HIM International Music [http://www.him.com.tw/album_a.asp?aid=51 ''Youth Society'' album info] 29 January 2002. Retrieved 2011-05-20</ref> It features S.H.E's first collaboration with [[Jay Chou]], who composed "熱帶雨林" (Tropical Rain Forest). The song would later be performed live with Chou during the first five stops of S.H.E's Perfect 3 Tour. This album features a larger number of covers relative to ''Girl's Dorm'', including "Remember", "給我多一點" (Give Me More), "催眠術" (Hypnotism) and "I've Never Been To Me." The track "熱帶雨林" (Tropical Rain Forest) is listed at number 4 on [[Hit Fm Taiwan]]'s ''Hit Fm Annual Top 100 Singles Chart'' (Hit-Fm年度百首單曲) for 2002.<ref>{{zh icon}} HITO Radio [http://www.hitoradio.com/charts/3c.php?ch_year=2002 ''Hit Fm Annual Top 100 Singles Chart'' 2002 (#1-50)] Retrieved 2011-04-16</ref> ==Track listing== # "Remember" # "Belief" # "幸福留言" ''Xin Fu Liu Yan'' (Message of Happiness) # "給我多一點" ''Gei Wo Duo Yi Dian'' (Give Me More) # "熱帶雨林" ''Re Dai Yu Lin'' (Tropical Rain Forest) – composed by [[Jay Chou]] # "記得要忘記" ''Ji De Yao Wang Ji'' (Remember to Forget) – cover of "Darling" by Kiroro # "圍巾" ''Wei Jin'' (Scarf) # "愛我的資格" ''Ai Wo De Zi Ge'' (Requirement for Loving Me) # "催眠術" ''Cui Mian Shu'' (Hypnotism) # "I've Never Been to Me" (sung in English) – cover of song by Charlene ==Music videos== Similar to ''Girls Dorm'', not all of the songs in ''Youth Society'' had music videos; the last five tracks used edited concert footage instead. S.H.E's second karaoke VCD combined the music videos from ''Youth Society'' with all four videos from ''Girls Dorm''. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{zh icon}} [http://www.him.com.tw/album.asp?atid=2 S.H.E discography@HIM International Music] {{S.H.E}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Youth Society}} [[Category:2002 albums]] [[Category:S.H.E albums]] [[Category:HIM International Music albums]] {{Taiwan-music-stub}}
